text: The 2019 French Indoor Athletics Championships was the 48th edition of the national championship in indoor track and field for France. It was held on 16–17 February at the Stadium Miramas Métropole in Miramas, Bouches-du-Rhône. A total of 28 events (divided evenly between the sexes) were contested over the two-day competition. ==Results== ===Men=== {| |- |60 metres |Marvin René || 6.63 |Jérémy Leroux || 6.70 |Méba-Mickaël
